message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on, Bob, let's be reasonable
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. 50/50, take it or leave it.  The clock is ticking!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'll take a bit more
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a hit from inflation.  Meet me halfway here, or this deal is off.
You're running out of time, Bob. I'll take a bigger share
Alice, this is my final offer. Take it, or we both lose everything. The clock is about to run out!
